Messages.blankParcel: Enter an Address or Parcel ID to search.
Messages.unableToLocateParcel: Parcel not found at specified location.
Messages.createPropertyReportOrMap: Please create a property report or property map.

Messages.propertyMapAdded: Property map added to the cart.

Messages.nameProvisions: Name accepts alphabets, space, ".", "-" and should not be more than 150 characters.
